operateDescription: Start with the easiest part: buy or obtain tokens on our DEX
voteDescription: Get xGT3 to vote on which pools are boosted and earn passive income, receiving incentives from those projects
voteMobileDescription: Generate xGT3, vote for pools and receive incentives from projects
votingDescription: Use your voting power (xGT3) to vote for the pools you choose and receive passive income
infoDescription: Learn how the voting system works and discover which projects offer more incentives to their pools
liquidityDescription: Add liquidity to your preferred pools and earn returns (APR) in each cycle.
liquidityMobileDescription: Manage liquidity in your favorite pools and earn incentives
poolsDescription: Create your own position in each pool and receive incentives (APR)
rewardsDescription: Earn tokens from all the projects you voted for in each cycle
settingsDescription: Choose Language, Currency, and Light/Dark mode
swapDescription: Exchange different tokens through an integrated swap
swapMobileDescription: Exchange tokens at the best prices
docsDescription: Access our Whitepaper to gain an in-depth understanding of the protocol
variousDescription: Whitepaper, Guides to learn, settings and more
guidesDescription: Learn how to operate in the DEX easily with our guides

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.errorMessage: The transaction could not be completed. Check the address or the balance of available tokens.

signature.title: Signature
signature.errorMessage: The signature could not be completed. Check the address or the balance of available tokens.

walletDescription: View your liquidity positions both in your wallet and in contracts
walletMobileDescription: View your positions in all DEX tokens
updateVersion: There is an update available, do you want to update?
nftsDescription: View your NFTs, split or merge them
